result.html: Fuair sí básShe died.
result.ponchtml: Fuair sí básShe died.

result.eng: His health started declining and he died.
result.ga: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé bás
result.orig: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé bás
result.html: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé básHis health started declining and he died.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ an tsláinte ag meaṫ air agus fuair sé básHis health started declining and he died.

result.eng: I pity the poor woman who died.
result.ga: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.orig: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.html: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.
result.ponchtml: Tá trua agam don ḃean ḃoċt a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.

result.eng: My husband died two years ago.
result.ga: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.orig: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.html: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shinMy husband died two years ago.
result.ponchtml: Fuair m'ḟear céile bás ḋá ḃliain ó ẛinMy husband died two years ago.

result.eng: Her husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ga: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.orig: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.html: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ponchtml: Cailleaḋ a fear céile go tobann anuraiḋ beannaċt Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.

result.ga: Fuair sé bás tobann gan choinne
result.orig: Fuair sé bás tobann gan choinne
result.html: Fuair sé bás tobann gan choinneHe died suddenly and unexpectedly.
result.ponchtml: Fuair sé bás tobann gan ċoinneHe died suddenly and unexpectedly.

result.eng: Everybody who ever died in this house.
result.ga: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.orig: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.html: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamhEverybody who ever died in this house.
result.ponchtml: Iomlán a ḃfuair bás sa teaċ seo riaṁEverybody who ever died in this house.
